commit message: Gradle Update

Merge pull request #1332 from prashantkhurana/New-Gradle

Gradle Update
Add /r/myrandom to special subreddits and shorten the sort methods
Made overflow Refresh action consistent
Update & rename the changelog

Merge pull request #1344 from Nxt3/overflow-items

Made overflow Refresh action consistent

Make the order of the overflow menu for direct viewed subreddits
closer to that of a normal subreddit
Redesigned sidebar with flat buttons

Merge pull request #1345 from Nxt3/sidebar-redesign-again

Redesigned sidebar with flat buttons
Update changelog link in README
Removed tooltips for sidebar buttons
Changed moderator icon in sidebar

Merge pull request #1346 from Nxt3/sidebar-redesign-again

Removed tooltips for sidebar buttons
Made the inbox count, multireddits, moderated subs, and friends list load after loading the initial subreddit
Removed debug message

Heavily modified the authentication workflow, now it uses cached authentication data if possible (if the token isn't expired) using a change in JRAW I pushed earlier, Loading should be much faster and the calls are in a more logical order
Make domain filter and open external fields textUri inputs
Crash fixes, Added a default catch in the RecyclerView LayoutManagers for IndexOutOfBoundsException (fixes a crash while changing the dataset and scrolling in a different thread)
Update version number
Fixed opening externally for viewpager posts
Made the SubsamplingScaleImageView release the bitmap on the MediaFragment destruction, Switched to the MediaFragment for the rest of the Shadowbox links
Fixed gallery links in Shadowbox
Fixed some imgur issues in the MediaView
Fixed crash on KitKat opening the sidebar
Bugfixes, Fixed clicking items in the sidebar not working
Improved scrollign smoothness of the main view by pausing image loads, Made album grid view use smaller image sizes
Update version number
Edited the view styles a little bit, added more contrast between the title and the info
Undid the image pausing while scrolling
